jason.name: Jason
jason.bio: Visionary leader with 15+ years in blockchain technology. Previously led engineering teams at major tech companies before founding Dubhe to revolutionize Move development.

joan.name: Joan
joan.bio: Former Move core developer with deep expertise in smart contract architecture. Leads our technical vision and oversees all engineering initiatives.

david.name: David
david.bio: Full-stack engineer passionate about developer tools and ecosystem growth. Leads our engine development team and drives technical innovation.

bonnie.name: Bonnie
bonnie.bio: Community builder with extensive experience growing developer ecosystems. Manages our global community initiatives and ambassador program.

liam.name: Liam McKenzie
liam.bio: Business development expert focused on strategic partnerships and ecosystem growth. Previously led partnerships at major blockchain companies.

emily.name: Emily Smith
emily.bio: PhD in Computer Science specializing in distributed systems. Leads our research initiatives and explores cutting-edge blockchain technologies.

hero.title: Fund Your Innovation
hero.description: Receive non-repayable grants from Dubhe Foundation to build open-source Move applications, infrastructure, and tools. All projects must be fully functional and complete all milestones.

infrastructure.description: Build core infrastructure, developer tools, and ecosystem utilities

dapp.title: DApp Development

process.title: Application Process
process.description: Simple 5-step process to get your project funded

proposal.title: Proposal Submission
proposal.description: Submit comprehensive proposal with detailed milestones and open-source commitment

review.title: Foundation Review
review.description: Dubhe Foundation technical committee evaluates feasibility and ecosystem impact

interview.title: Team Interview
interview.description: Present your project roadmap and demonstrate technical capabilities

approval.title: Grant Approval
approval.description: Foundation board approves non-repayable grant with milestone requirements

delivery.title: Milestone Delivery
delivery.description: Complete all milestones with functional deliverables and receive full grant

requirements.title: Application Requirements
items: Complete open-source commitment (MIT/Apache 2.0 license required)
Detailed milestone-based development plan
Experienced team with proven development track record
Fully functional deliverables - no prototypes or demos
Comprehensive documentation and deployment guides
Strong alignment with Dubhe ecosystem growth goals

successStories.title: Success Stories
successStories.description: Projects that received grants and made significant impact

nonRepayable.title: Non-Repayable Grant
nonRepayable.description: All grants are unconditional donations from Dubhe Foundation. No repayment required upon successful milestone completion.

openSource.title: Open Source Required
openSource.description: All funded projects must be released under MIT or Apache 2.0 license. Complete source code must be publicly available.

completion.title: Full Milestone Completion
completion.description: Projects must deliver fully functional, production-ready software. All milestones must be completed to receive the full grant.

finalCta.title: Ready to Build Open Source?
finalCta.description: Apply for a Foundation grant and contribute to the open-source Dubhe ecosystem

requirements: Active community member for at least 3 months

Excellent communication and conflict resolution skills
Available for moderation duties across different time zones
Commitment to fair and impartial decision making

rules: Treat all community members with respect and courtesy
Use clear, professional language in all interactions
De-escalate conflicts and promote constructive dialogue
Be patient with newcomers and provide helpful guidance
Apply community rules consistently and fairly
Document all moderation actions with clear reasoning
Escalate complex issues to senior moderators or admins
Review and appeal processes should be transparent
Protect user privacy and personal information
Never share moderation tools or credentials

hero.title: Your Privacy
hero.subtitle: Learn how Dubhe Foundation protects your privacy and handles your data with transparency and security.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At Dubhe Foundation, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our platform, services, and applications related to the Dubhe blockchain ecosystem.

collection.title: Information We Collect
items: Personal information you provide when using our services
Technical information about your device and network connection
Usage data and analytics to improve our platform
Wallet addresses and blockchain transaction data

usage.title: How We Use Information
items: To provide and improve our blockchain development platform
To process grant applications and incubation programs
To communicate about updates, events, and opportunities
To ensure platform security and prevent fraud

protection.title: Data Protection
items: We implement industry-standard security measures
All sensitive data is encrypted in transit and at rest
We never store private keys or sensitive wallet information
Regular security audits and compliance reviews

sharing.title: Data Sharing
items: We do not sell personal information to third parties
Limited sharing with service providers under strict agreements
Public blockchain data is inherently transparent
We may share data to comply with legal requirements

access.title: Access & Control
items: Request access to your personal data
Correct inaccurate information
Delete your account and data
Export your data

communication.title: Communication
items: Opt out of marketing communications
Choose notification preferences
Control cookie settings
Request data processing limitations

contact.title: Questions About Privacy?
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us.

hero.title: Terms of
hero.subtitle: These terms govern your use of Dubhe services, platforms, and blockchain infrastructure.

introduction.title: Agreement Overview
introduction.content1: Welcome to Dubhe! These Terms of Service ("Terms") form a legally binding agreement between you and Dubhe Foundation ("we," "us," or "our") regarding your use of our blockchain platform, development tools, and related services.
introduction.content2: By using our services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and our Privacy Policy. If you are using our services on behalf of an organization, you represent that you have the authority to bind that organization to these Terms.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
items: By accessing or using Dubhe services, you agree to be bound by these Terms
If you disagree with any part of these terms, you may not access our services
We may update these terms from time to time without prior notice
Your continued use constitutes acceptance of revised terms

usage.title: Use of Services
items: You must be at least 18 years old to use our services
You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account
You may not use our services for any illegal or unauthorized purpose
We reserve the right to terminate accounts that violate these terms

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
items: Dubhe Foundation retains all rights to our proprietary technology
Open-source components are governed by their respective licenses
You retain ownership of content you create using our platform
You grant us license to use your content to provide our services

disclaimers.title: Disclaimers & Limitations
items: Our services are provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind
We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages
Blockchain transactions are irreversible and we cannot reverse them
You acknowledge the experimental nature of blockchain technology

participation.title: Network Participation
items: Transactions are recorded on public blockchains
Network fees apply to blockchain operations
Smart contracts are immutable once deployed
You are responsible for transaction accuracy

risks.title: Risk Acknowledgment
items: Blockchain technology is experimental
Token values can be highly volatile
Smart contracts may contain bugs
Network congestion may affect performance

governance.title: Governing Law and Disputes
governance.law: These Terms shall be interpreted and governed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction where Dubhe Foundation is established, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
governance.disputes: Any disputes arising from these Terms or your use of our services shall be resolved through binding arbitration in accordance with international arbitration rules.
governance.modifications: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Continued use of our services after changes constitutes acceptance of the modified Terms.

contact.title: Questions About Terms?
contact.description: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact our legal team.
